attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I reckon she should run the country because;
1)shes proper hot
2)shes clever
3)shes got one cool (in love) boyfriend
4)no-one would mess, shes hard.
5)Last but not least, shes simply the best person in the whole country. nuff said.
=D

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
